plot: Dutch girl Johanna loves poor Joachim, but marries the weathy Miller. When the miller finds out, he takes revenge.
title: Le Moulin maudit
plot_es: Dutch girl Johanna loves poor Joachim, but marries the weathy Miller. When the miller finds out, he takes revenge.
plot_en: Dutch girl Johanna loves poor Joachim, but marries the weathy Miller. When the miller finds out, he takes revenge.
